name: addusertogroup

arguments.name: groupname
arguments.desc: The group to add the user to

arguments.name: server
arguments.desc: The target computer to perform the addition on. use \"\" for the local machine

arguments.name: domain
arguments.desc:
he domain/computer for the account. You must give 
                    the domain name for the user if it is a domain account, or
                    use \"\" to target an account on the local machine.

desc: Add the specified user to the group. Domain groups only!
